message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $20,000.  I believe it will be very valuable to you, and this is a fair starting point for our discussion.
I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Can we meet in the middle somewhere?
Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand where you're coming from, but $12,000 is too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $17,000?
I'm still not sure I can go up to $17,000, Alice. How about we meet at $14,000? I'm willing to compromise, but I'm trying to stay within my budget.
